name: Bone Lord
description: The Bone Lord is a gigantic figure comprised of skeletal remains, radiating an aura of decay and death. Its presence commands respect and fear, adorned with remnants of its fallen enemies and exuding a menacing confidence.
memorable: Its ability to summon and control numerous undead minions makes it a terrifying combatant, and its Rejuvenation power ensures it remains a persistent threat.
goals: To spread death and decay while commanding lesser undead to do its bidding.
relations: Typically serves as a master to various undead creatures, such as skeletons and zombies. Will often command ghouls and wights in battle.
environment: Commonly found in dark, desolate locations like graveyards, ruins, or places steeped in necromantic energy.
strengths: High durability and magical weapon attacks add an additional necrotic damage, while its ability to summon undead reinforces its combat capabilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to effects targeting constructs and radiant damage, potentially turning the tide against it.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of tail strikes and claw attacks, both infused with necrotic energy, and is capable of grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Pattern of Death ability unleashes a wave of necrotic energy that not only damages enemies but heals friendly undead.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 90 feet and a high passive Perception score of 20, allowing it to effectively detect hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in perception, making it capable of spotting threats in low light.
additional_information: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Can exist without needing air, food, drink, or sleep.
Ability to command undead makes it a formidable leader on the battlefield.
Can rejuvenate into a new body if any part of it remains intact.
